title: [Extra Visual] Period 3 orbits of a Julia Set

media:group.media:title: [Extra Visual] Period 3 orbits of a Julia Set
media:group.media:description:
This visual show all the orbits over a Julia Set.  The location of c for this Juliet is within the period 3 bulb of the Mandelbrot, and you will notice the orbits settle down to a period 3 pattern.  (These are the orbits of the Julia Set, not the Mandelbrot).

In this series:
1 - https://youtu.be/7MotVcGvFMg The Mandelbrot Set Explained
2 - https://youtu.be/dctJ7ISkU-4 Julia Sets, and how they relate to The Mandelbrot Set
3 - https://youtu.be/5T0cC6KRezo How to Build a Julia Set 
4 - https://youtu.be/oNxPSP2tQEk Number Sequences in the Mandelbrot Set
